import './topbar.css' import {Link, useLocation} from 'react-router-dom' import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' export default function TopBar() { const user = false; var names const [posts, setPosts] = useState([]); const {search} = useLocation(); useEffect(() => { const fetchPosts = async () =>{ const res = await axios.get("/posts"+ search) setPosts(res.data) } fetchPosts() }, [search]) return (
